creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: neck band is braid flanked by 2" trim with long white running stitches and purple print patches;  trim ends have silver and black beads which weave into pattern before forming "fringe"; reverse has elaborate silver on black 9.25 x 7.25" attached embroidery panel which forms 17" black and silver fringe; white tape band on sides and reverse bottom
title: Jacket
